body.p: With HPE Helion OpenStack you have the freedom to choose the hardware you want to run cloud compute, storage, and networking. To help you deploy a multi-vendor datacenter, HPE verifies and certifies hardware that is both HPE and non-HPE hardware.

At HPE, the Helion Ready Program for Hardware Vendors (IHV) team has been working to ensure that the F5 Networks hardware integrates with HPE Helion OpenStack. F5 Networks provide load balancing and a range of integrated products to improve the speed and security of the delivery of web-based applications.
